Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory214.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Are you guys all right?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fisher A', 3: "We don't need no sympathy from ya sinners.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fisher A', 3: "And 's not like 'em bionics...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fisher B', 3: 'Shhh, dun bring it up, ya dolt.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'After the battle, Rosetta approaches the rescued ARU members, offering help.'}
{3: 'But her extended hand is met with the same hostility as before.'}
{2: 'We rescued you.', 3: '10', 4: 'Why are you so hostile to the Forest Guards?', 5: '11'}
{2: 'Fisher A', 3: "Y'all just repayin' yer debts.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fisher A', 3: "The Capt. had ye over, aye... Yeah, yeah, thanks n' all, but this's ARU matter, not yers.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'And with that, they struggle to their feet, hobbling toward the facilities with their weapons as a crutch.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: '...They should be able to get this place up and running like before in no time. But anyway, I never thought the reinforcements from Babylonia would be 【kuroname】 and you, Rosetta.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Confirming the safety of the surroundings, Diana approaches you. She seems relieved at seeing you once again.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'm only temporarily staying at Babylonia. So if the ARU requires help, I'd naturally be the most appropriate candidate.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'What about you, 【kuroname】?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'At the behest of our dear Rosetta.', 3: '17', 4: 'Thanks for your help in Kowloong.', 5: '19'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'Huh, I see... So Constructs in Babylonia get to appoint their commandants? If 【kuroname】 is on the menu, then color me intrigued.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'This is only a temporary arrangement. 【kuroname】 is still the commandant for the Gray Ravens.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'Oh... You found out? And here I was, hoping to be a hero behind the scenes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Don't try something that dangerous again, Diana. Especially with my kind of luck.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'Sigh, here you go with the luck stuff again, Rosetta.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'Anyway, 【kuroname】... Did Rosetta make you wear this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'A big plump robot I am...', 3: '24', 4: 'Yes.', 5: '25'}

{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's bulky, but it has the defensive capability to match. And if you activate its built-in acceleration system, you might just be able to keep up with us for a few seconds.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'That means she cares about you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "These Polar Soldier units just feel so nice and smooth. I've seen all sorts of piloted models, but somehow this one gives me warm and fuzzy feelings inside...", 4: '1'}
{3: "From gentle head-scritches of your Polar Soldier unit, Diana's hand gradually quickens into rambunctious rubbing. The paint above your head is definitely thinning."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Diana... Now's not the time for that. Do you have info on the current situation?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'Of course. We saw the Babylonia reinforcements leaving the stronghold, and rushed over. Now we can recover the lost territory.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You should be able to handle the bionics.', 3: '30', 4: 'What were you guys doing before?', 5: '33'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "True, but we're shorthanded. If we want to hold a region, we'll have to station too many of our forces.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "And if we don't do so, no matter how many areas we recover, they'll likely be recaptured again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "That's why we were engaging in guerrilla warfare up until this point.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'We were conducting guerrilla warfare. The enemy has us outnumbered, so we have to resort to picking off the enemies trying to attack the main base.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: 'Boss, Rosetta—you hear me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: 'Oh, the Forest Guards too! It sure is nice seeing everyone all safe and sound!', 4: '2'}
{3: "We just received word that Simon's mission is complete."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "Atiel, you are as energetic as ever. So what's the news?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: "Boss, I want to confirm the status on the regions recovery. We've managed to retake the resource pipeline. What about the hub facilities on your end?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Done and done.', 3: '39', 4: 'Are you guys okay?', 5: '40'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: "I knew you'd kill it, Boss. Now, things can finally get moving.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: "We're okay, but Atiel...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: "I'm okay—just a little scratch! I'm good to keep fighting.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: "In short, I intend to continue dispersing forces to deal with areas where the enemy's defenses are weakest. Boss, can you rendezvous with us at this position?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Yeah, a residential region. It occupies a larger area, so there are several times the bionics defending it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "So, we've got our work cut out for us, huh...", 4: '2'}
